title: Was Elizabeth Warren Once Fired for Being Pregnant?
subtitle: The 2020 presidential candidate's account of her time as a speech therapist in Riverdale, New Jersey, has come under renewed scrutiny.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 1971, now-U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren lost her job as a speech therapist in the public school district of Riverdale, New Jersey, because she became pregnant.
